original_text: “And because you listen to these rules and keep and do them, the Lord your God will keep with you the covenant and the steadfast love that he swore to your fathers.
korean_text: 너희가 이 모든 법도를 듣고 지켜 행하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 지켜 네게 인애를 베푸실 것이라

sentences.original_text: And because you listen to these rules
the Lord your God will keep with you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님이 너와 함께 지키시리라

sentences.original_text: the covenant and the steadfast love
that he swore to your fathers.
